casebody.data:
No. 2002-C-1496. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 4, 2002.

Michael William McGRAIL, Individually, and Raymond Winters, as the Tutor of James Phillip McGrail and Sandra Marie McGrail, Individually and as the Surviving Children of Margaret Alexandria Winters v. Jessie R. LEE, Mitchell Transporation Services, Inc. and Clarendon National Insurance Company, in Solido.
